sys_script_include.name: Incident AI Helper

sys_update_version.name: sys_script_include_e22c7e0483447614715ba230ceaad383
sys_update_version.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include"><sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><access>package_private</access><active>true</active><api_name>x_1567457_enhanced.Incident AI Helper</api_name><caller_access/><client_callable>false</client_callable><description/><name>Incident AI Helper</name><script><![CDATA[
var IncidentAIHelper = Class.create();
IncidentAIHelper.prototype = {
  initialize: function() {},

  getCategory: function(desc) {
    desc = desc.toLowerCase();
    if (desc.includes("email")) return "Software - Email";
    if (desc.includes("login")) return "Access - Login";
    if (desc.includes("server")) return "Infrastructure - Server";
    return "General";
  }
};
]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2025-09-13 06:47:58</sys_created_on><sys_id>e22c7e0483447614715ba230ceaad383</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Incident AI Helper</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Enhanced Incident AI" source="x_1567457_enhanced">1154be0483043214715ba230ceaad3b8</sys_package><sys_policy>read</sys_policy><sys_scope display_value="Enhanced Incident AI">1154be0483043214715ba230ceaad3b8</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_include_e22c7e0483447614715ba230ceaad383</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2025-09-13 06:47:58</sys_updated_on></sys_script_include></record_update>
